title: First steps
creator_credit: Alec MacLeod, Philip Bridgeman, Colin Low, Stanley Jackson and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: Overview of a Canadian program called “First steps” which is designed to provide extra stimulation and structured learning situations for children who are born with intellectual retardation. Suitable for tertiary levels. (Awards: Vancouver; Columbus; Salerno).
